question: Guess the movie: A fairytale villain confronts a snobby noble to stop him from taking his boggy home.
Guess the movie: A frazzled fish swims across the ocean to locate his missing family.
Guess the movie: A young man must fight monsters and defeat the god of death and prove himself worthy of his place among the greatest Greeks.
Guess the movie: A young boy learns he has magic powers and is thrust into a world of wizardry, where danger lurks in every corridor.
ans: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001)

question: Guess the movie: A young girl must navigate a world of spirits and dragons to find and save her hungry parents.
Guess the movie: A young woman dreams of opening her own business, but first she must undo a croaky curse.
Guess the movie: An unlikely band of adventurers embark on a dangerous journey to destroy an evil piece of jewelry, and the dark lord who seeks it.
Guess the movie: An exhausted mother travels parallel universes and uses her newly-acquired martial arts mastery to save her family, and reality itself.
Guess the movie: A young man masters his space wizard powers and, with his sister, leads a group of rebels against an oppressive galactic empire.
Guess the movie: A team of paleontologists visits a remote island where a businessman has cloned ancient fossils, bringing dinos back to life. Chaos ensues.
Guess the movie: A highschooler is lured into a world of vampires and werewolves, where she must choose between her safety and a forbidden romance.
Guess the movie: A young woman finds herself in the company of pirates, who seek to lift their gruesome curse.
Guess the movie: A computer hacker learns that his reality is not real, and leads the fight for freedom against sinister cyber-intelligence.
Guess the movie: An alien entity jumpstarts ape evolution. Lifetimes later, two astronauts find themselves stranded in space.
Guess the movie: A father plans a getaway in a remote hotel, which threatens to steal his sanity and break his family.
